text: And [every time] the great ones among his people, who refused to acknowledge the truth and gave the lie to the announcement of a life to come - [simply] because We had granted them ease and plenty in [their] worldly life, and they had become corrupted by it [every time] they would say: â€œThis [man] is nothing hut a mortal like yourselves, eating of what you eat, and drinking of what you drink
